General.Name: Ningbo Ginlong Technologies Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Ginlong Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, service, and sale of string inverters worldwide. The company provides single and three phase inverters; utility scale inverters; energy storage inverters; and export power manager, monitoring platform, data logging sticks, and other accessories, as well as after-sales services. It sells its products under the Solis brand. The company also engages in the investment and operation of photovoltaic power stations. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

2.Name: Ms. Chan  Zhang
2.Title: Non-Independent Director, Deputy GM & Board Sec.
